analysis.description:
Reentrancy in TokenTimelockPool.addBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#320-354):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) >= _amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#333-337)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- distributedTokens (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#340-341)

	External calls:
	- require(bool)(token.balanceOf(address(this)) >= _amount) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#333-337)

TokenTimelock.constructor (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#220-232) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseTime > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#228-229)

TokenTimelock.release (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#235-247) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= releaseTime) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#240-241)

TokenTimelockPool.constructor (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#291-302) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_releaseDate > block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#299-300)

TokenTimelockPool.addBeneficiary (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#320-354) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp < releaseDate) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#326-328)

TokenTimelockPool.reclaim (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#364-370) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > releaseDate) (/unique_chucks/28/0xb8fc015d8e495d315640ee6baa7b5f9b1d312b6c.sol#365)
